synopsis.text:
Swedish diplomats, renowned painters, and affluent hospital owners - these are just a few of the influential backgrounds of the members of the prestigious Yukan Club at St. President School, an institution known for its wealth and prestige. The club, comprised of Shouchikubai Miroku, Kenbishi Yuuri, Kikumasamune Seishirou, Hakushika Noriko, Kizakura Karen, and Bidou Granmarnier, is the epitome of popularity and affluence, commanding respect from their fellow students.

Their shared love for adventure leads them on thrilling escapades, from traversing the bustling streets of Hong Kong to embarking on daring missions to save their school and classmates. Even the simplest tasks, like locating a missing pet, become extraordinary journeys filled with excitement and danger. As they navigate through these adventures, the Yukan Club members never fail to keep their spare time entertaining, making their high school experience anything but ordinary.

This comedic anime delves into the lives of these wealthy students, showcasing their camaraderie, bravery, and zest for life. Prepare to be captivated by their thrilling escapades and join them in their action-packed adventures as they strive to protect their school and make lasting memories.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
